name: Sandwich Shooter
description:
Welcome to Sandwich Shooter!

The goal of the game is to make as many sandwiches in under sixty seconds by shooting the ingredients.

Aim your ship with the mouse cursor. Press the 'W' key to turn on your ship's thrusters, and left click to fire your ship's weapon.

Good Luck!

Score font: Libre Baskerville Font by Impallari Type

8-bit Sound effects by LittleRobotSoundFactory

Programmed in the Godot Engine.
